main.name: Dominik Skorupski
main.occupation: I finished an intense 5-month Kodilla Front End Bootcamp
main.description: Currently at the stage of rearranging towards Front End programmer. I also have 7 years of experience in the HR industry, sale of services and customer service. I speak English fluently and I know German at level B1
main.bio: I finished an intense 5-month Kodilla Front End programming course. Training and projects in following technologies: HTML, CSS, RWD, Git, JavaScript, AJAX, API, React, Webpack, Redux. I invite you to familiarize yourself with my projects and also my resume can be downloaded by button below :)

work.title: Student

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
